reviewText: John Facenda narrates it. Is there anything else that needs to be said? The music score to the highlight tape is what works the best.

got this cheap at a local VHS store for about 10 bucks and it has plenty of great moments.  My favorite is Riggins coming out of retirement for Joe Gibbs!!  amazing footage here!  too bad the only guy selling it right now is trying for so much $$$ - what a greedy jerk lol
